title: FA charges - February 2024
body_text:
29 February 2024
Participating in a fixture whilst under a suspension
Connor Kennedy, Player, Harborough Town FC
Breach of FA Rule E10 - It is alleged that he has failed to comply with a suspension by participating in the following fixtures:
Harborough Town FC v Gresley Rovers FC
Northern Premier League Midlands Division
27 January 2024
Harborough Town FC v Bedworth United FC
Northern Premier League Midlands Division
3 February 2024
Mr Kennedy has until 6pm on 7th March 2024 to provide a response.
Failing to ensure that a Player associated with the Club complied with a suspension
Harborough Town FC
Breach of FA Rule E12 - It is alleged that they failed to ensure that Mr Connor Kennedy complied with a suspension, in that he participated in the following fixtures:
Harborough Town FC v Gresley Rovers FC
Northern Premier League Midlands Division
27 January 2024
Harborough Town FC v Bedworth United FC
Northern Premier League Midlands Division
3 February 2024
The Club have until 6pm on 7th March 2024 to provide a response.
INCIDENT OF MISCONDUCT – NON-STANDARD CASE
Tom Prodomo, Reserves Manager, AFC Bournemouth
AFC Bournemouth Reserves v Watford FC Reserves
Professional Development League South
30 November 2023
Breach of FA Rule E3.1 - It is alleged that during the first half of the above fixture he repeatedly acted in an improper manner, resulting in two cautions, leading to his dismissal.
Mr Prodomo has until 6pm on 7th March 2024 to provide a response.
